mapper.delete: DELETE FROM org_unit WHERE uid IN (SELECT uid FROM (SELECT uid FROM org_unit WHERE uid = #{_parameter} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM org_unit WHERE parent_unit_id = #{_parameter} AND is_delete = 0)) a)
mapper.update: UPDATE org_unit SET is_delete = 1 WHERE uid IN (SELECT uid FROM (SELECT uid FROM org_unit WHERE uid = #{_parameter} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM org_unit WHERE parent_unit_id = #{_parameter} AND is_delete = 0)) a)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM org_user WHERE is_delete = 0 AND org_unit_id = #{unitId}
